body.subsection: The jrpack package implements a set of simple rectangle packing algorithms. The algorithms are general purpose: they take a set of rectangles and attempt to pack them into a large rectangle in a space-efficient manner. Rectangle packing is often used during lightmap generation and in the generation of GPU textures for efficient text rendering.

ul.li: 90% automated unit test coverage of executable code.
Platform independent (tested on FreeBSD, Linux, Mac OS X, Solaris, Windows XP).
